verses.roman:
ei-mata sanātana rahe prabhu-sthāne
jagannāthera cakra dekhi' karena praṇāme

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; rahe—remains; prabhu-sthāne—under the care of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jagannāthera—of Lord Jagannātha; cakra—the wheel on the top of the temple; dekhi'-seeing; karena praṇāme—offers respectful obeisances.
translation: In this way, Sanātana Gosvāmī stayed under the care of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. He would see the wheel on the pinnacle of the Jagannātha temple and offer respectful obeisances.
